verses.name: Job 15:25
verses.text: For he stretcheth out his hand against God, and strengtheneth himself against the Almighty.

verses.name: Job 15:26
verses.text: He runneth upon him, even on his neck, upon the thick bosses of his bucklers:

verses.name: Job 15:27
verses.text: Because he covereth his face with his fatness, and maketh collops of fat on his flanks.

verses.name: Job 15:28
verses.text: And he dwelleth in desolate cities, and in houses which no man inhabiteth, which are ready to become heaps.

verses.name: Job 15:29
verses.text: He shall not be rich, neither shall his substance continue, neither shall he prolong the perfection thereof upon the earth.
